import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get location floorplans"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/{locationId}/floorplans"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all floorplan files associated with a location. Floorplans are visual floor layouts that can be used for asset placement and room mapping within the location.

**Prerequisites**
1. **locationId** - Obtain via [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-v-2) and extract `Items[].LocationId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List locations: [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-v-2) â†’ extract target `LocationId`.
2. Call this endpoint: [GET /api/v2.0/locations/\{locationId\}/floorplans](/docs/api/locations/get-location-floorplans-v-2).
3. For each floorplan, use [GET /api/v1.0/files/\{FileId\}](/docs/api/files/download-file) to download the actual file.

**Related Endpoints:**
- [POST /api/v2.0/locations/\{locationId\}/floorplans](/docs/api/locations/update-location-floorplans-v-2) - Update floorplan associations
- [GET /api/v2.0/locations/\{locationId\}/images](/docs/api/locations/get-location-images-v-2) - Get location images
- [POST /api/v1.0/files/upload](/docs/api/files/upload-file) - Upload a new floorplan file

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>
